name: Dashing through the Sunrise
description:
Catch the morning sun for some light exercise to get the day going.

Controls:

Left click to shoot your harpoon. It'll pull you in if it hits a rock. Avoid burning to death in the sun.

Feedback:

If you have performance issues, crashes or find any weird behaviour, let me know.

Changelog:

2016-12-17:

  • Major performance optimizations

2016-11-18:

  • Adjusted movement and harpoon physics, allows more dynamic play now
  • Moved asteroid generation to separate thread so the game doesn't lock up when new clusters are added
  • Other various stability fixes
  • Linux package
  • Getting playable on Android too
